alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 2:52PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Fulton County through 315 PM CDT... At 252 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sturkie, or near Salem in Fulton County, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salem in Fulton County... Mammoth Spring... Viola... Sturkie... Mammoth Spring State Park... Flint Springs... Moko... Fryatt... Camp... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
